resources.string: Secure mode.\nOnly encrypted data is displayed.
Could not get location! Please restart app to check permissions.

GPS Provider not enabled! Please check if GPS is turned on.
No CellTower of Wifi-Accesspoint-Info could be found.
Location Services not enabled! Please check if Location is turned on
You are currently already in security mode!
Could not connect to encrypted database. Please check password!
Password field is empty. Please enter a password!
Could not create new location report. Please check your internet connectivity!

All data which is saved after enabling security is stored in an encrypted database. After exiting, it can only be viewed after enabling security. CHANGING THE PASSWORD IS NOT POSSIBLE!\n\nAll data saved outside of security mode will remain unencrypted and will not be visible in security mode.
